
/*shubham54*/
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <iomanip>
#include <climits>
#include <algorithm>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <utility>
#include <cstring>
#include <list>
#include <stack>
#include <cmath>

#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
inline int getchar_unlocked() { return getchar(); }
inline void putchar_unlocked(char a) { putchar(a); }
#endif

/*fast input*/
inline void fastRead(long long int*a)
{
	register char c=0;
	while (c<33)
	{
		c=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	*a=0;
	if( c=='-' )
	{
		c=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	while (c>33)
	{
		*a=*a*10+c-48;
		c=getchar_unlocked();
	}
}
/*fast write*/
inline void fastWrite(long long int a)
{
	char snum[20];
	int i=0;
	do
	{
		snum[i++]=a%10+48;
		a=a/10;
	}while(a!=0);
	i=i-1;
	while(i>=0)
	putchar_unlocked(snum[i--]);
	putchar_unlocked('\n');
}


using namespace std;

long long int fre[1000010];

int main()
{
    long long int  n,i,a,ma,ans,temp;
    fastRead(&n);
    memset(fre,0,sizeof(fre));
    ma=-1;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        fastRead(&a);
        fre[a]++;
        ma=max(ma,a);
    }
    ans=n*(n-1)/2;
    for(i=0;i<=ma;i++)
    {
        if(fre[i]>1)
        {
            temp=fre[i]*(fre[i]-1)/2;
            ans=ans-temp;
        }
    }
    fastWrite(ans);
    return 0;
}
